summary: Seasoned business development professional with a track record in media platforms, advertising campaigns, and client relationship management across financial services and entertainment sectors. Experienced in launching campaigns, building pipelines, and leading cross-functional teams.

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Led platform for video content and native video ads; reported to COO and CRO; drove new business initiatives and strategies for publishers and advertisers. Launched Cinema6's first campaigns (premium spirits and athletic brands) with 100% profit. Negotiated contracts with vendors (Jun Group, Veeseo, Adblade, Bidtellect). Built a client pipeline via phone, email, and meetings. Prepared weekly reports on new business and campaigns.

experience.title: Sales and Service Desk Specialist
experience.description: Supported and managed relationships with Financial Advisors across the Pacific Northwest, Mid-America, nationwide and internationally. Educated Advisors on Alternative Investment products on the Merrill Lynch platform (strategies, fee structure, and purchase/redemption schedules). Recognized as top Sales and Service Desk Specialist; helped launch Best Practitioner program for generating new business on the Alternative Investment platform. Awarded 2013 Alternative Investments Most Net Sales to Budget for the Pacific Northwest Region.

experience.title: New Business Director
experience.description: Provided financial solutions that reduced cash flow expenditures and offset losses on underperforming assets to fund media expenditures. Introduced ORION Trading to 75-150 accounts with annual media budgets over $4M. Sourced and maintained relationships with Fortune 1000 executives. Sourced and brokered new business with clients including Vail Resorts, Cargill, Pergo, Black & Decker, and Colonial Williamsburg. Produced monthly newsletters for ORION clients and employees highlighting innovations and solutions.

experience.title: Sales Manager
experience.description: Maximized Showtime Networks subscriber growth and revenue in affiliate customer service centers in the Midwest and Western territories. Managed 10 accounts with $894,623 in combined revenue; achieved 1% account net growth. Led on-site training for 15-20 personnel; created and implemented motivational methods to influence sales. Led new business development initiatives in Seneca, SC and Seattle, WA, increasing revenue in previously zero-revenue locations. Built an extensive network of clients via calls, meetings, and client management events.

experience.title: Summer Analyst
experience.description: Conducted research for Portfolio Managers on portfolio investments, including analyses of 10-K and 10-Q reports. Tracked trading volume and prices of key stocks for institutional and private clients; produced weekly reports and assisted trading desk with market database analysis on prospective trades.
